name: KOI (itch) (la.ri.fa.ri)
description:
KOI is an interactive VR experience. A bus pulls off at a stop of nowhere. You hop off. You are given the task of feeding some Koi fish using your own flesh, until there is nothing of you left. Perhaps, or perhaps not.

Website: https://www.larifari.la/koi

The video shown on this page is a recording from a fixed camera, not from the gameplay (first-person) view point.
